ON_FILE_COPY.TEXT: You are about to copy received {singular, select, true{a document} other{{nbItems} documents}} for a total of {totalSize} into your own files.
ON_FILE_COPY.TITLE: File copy

TEXT.CONTACTS_LIST: You are about to remove {singular, select, true{a contacts list} other{{nbItems} contacts lists}} ! Beware, this action cannot be undone.
TEXT.CONTACTS_LIST_CONTACT: You are about to remove {singular, select, true{a contact} other{{nbItems} contacts}} ! Beware, this action cannot be undone.
TEXT.DOCUMENT: You are about to remove {singular, select, true{a document} other{{nbItems} documents}} ! Beware, this action cannot be undone.
TEXT.GUEST: You are about to remove {singular, select, true{a guest} other{{nbItems} guests}} ! Beware, this action cannot be undone.
TEXT.RECEIVED_SHARE: You are about to remove {singular, select, true{a file share} other{{nbItems} files share}} ! Beware, this action cannot be undone.
TEXT.WORKGROUP: You are about to remove {singular, select, true{a workgroup} other{{nbItems} workgroups}} ! Beware, this action cannot be undone.
TEXT.WORKGROUP_NODE: You are about to remove {singular, select, true{a document or folder} other{{nbItems} documents or folders}} ! Beware, this action cannot be undone.
TEXT.WORKGROUP_VERSION: You are about to remove {singular, select, true{a version} other{{nbItems} versions}} ! Beware, this action cannot be undone.
TEXT.WORKGROUP_VERSION_LAST: This is the last version, you are about to delete the file! Beware, this action cannot be undone.
TEXT.WORKGROUP_VERSION_ALL: You have selected all existing versions, you are about to delete the file! Beware, this action cannot be undone.
TEXT.2FA_SHARED_KEY: You are about to remove shared key ! Beware, this action cannot be undone.

ON_LOCALSTORAGE_DELETE.TITLE: Are you sure?
ON_LOCALSTORAGE_DELETE.TEXT: All your saved localStorage values will be removed

ON_MULTIPLE_DOWNLOAD.TEXT: You are going to download {{nbFiles}} files (total size : {{totalSize}})
ON_MULTIPLE_DOWNLOAD.TITLE: Multiple download

ON_SHARE_DELETE.TEXT: You are about to remove a share !
ON_SHARE_DELETE.TITLE: Are you sure?

ON_WORKGROUP_MEMBER_DELETE.TITLE: Member deletion
ON_WORKGROUP_MEMBER_DELETE.TEXT: You are about to remove {{firstName}} {{lastName}} from the workgroup {{workgroupName}}.

ACTION.BROWSER_ACTION: {singular, select, true{The file or folder has} other{files or folders have}} been {action, select, moved{moved} other{copied}} into : {folderName}.
ACTION.CONTACTS_LIST_CREATION: The Contacts List {{contactsListName}} has been created successfully.
ACTION.COPY: {singular, select, true{The file has been} other{{nbItems} files have been}} copied into your Personal Space.
ACTION.COPY_SAME_FOLDER: {singular, select, true{The file} other{Files}} has been copied successfully.
ACTION.COPY_VERSION: A new version of {{targetNodeName}} has been successfully added.
ACTION.DELETE_WORKGROUP_MEMBER: {{firstName}} {{lastName}} has been removed successfully from the Workgroup
ACTION.REFRESH: You must refresh the application to take this action into account
ACTION.SHARE_DELETED: Your file share with {{recipient}} was removed successfully.
ACTION.SHARE_ASYNC: Your file share will be sent after the upload of all files.
ACTION.RESTORE: The version has been restored sucessfully.

FORWARD.ERROR: Failed to forward {nbItems} {singular, select, true{file} other{files}}.

COPY_BEFORE_FORWARD.INFO: {singular, select, true{The file has been} other{{nbItems} files have been}} copied into your Personal Space but cannot be shared.

ERROR.FILE_NOT_FOUND: The selected file has not been found

RENAME_INVALID.ENDING_POINT: The name cannot finish by the character '.'

DELETE_ERROR.26448: The version has not been found

ERROR.NO_RESPONSE_ERROR: Error without server response, see logs.
